description: The Manx Re-Start scheme will subsidise eligible employee's salaries up to 70% of the living wage.
title: Coronavirus: Re-Start job support scheme backed by Tynwald
title_page: Coronavirus: Re-Start job support scheme backed by Tynwald - BBC News
maintext: Speaker of the House of Keys, Juan Watterson, backed the scheme but questioned whether the scheme would be "value for money" and if jobs would have "stickability".
